attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Through the last thirty years we have seen  Great Britain,once the focal point of economics and democracy in the world be dictated to by the federal menace that the Eu is.The  harsh decline in British indusrty,the poverty of the British farmers and the mass influx of Poles,romanians and czechs are devastating many of our once prospurus towns and cities due to lack of infastruture and literally space!This country has seen much devastation in the last few decades but to allow this to continue.......could you defend it?Britian has always been charitable abroad and will continue to play a dominant role in helping the prephiery areas of the continent.We need the support of every British person to help stabalise our economy and bring Britian back to its position as "workshop of the World".

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
